statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 1000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 'b8048afa-6187-43d5-8e61-fb36270b11b0';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET block_number = 200 WHERE sender_address = '0x5e3f8d7350d7511468c81afe10eed30f410cabf9';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET receiver_address = '0x8ac0d48a764f2b4f6c2127f800b74778f195c6e8' WHERE transaction_id = '9028e3fa-1b05-4931-8caf-3274ec288c1b';
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount - 100 WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc'
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET receiver_address = '0x456def' WHERE amount > 1000
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET block_number = 10, timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 'c4a620ee-86b2-4ae5-9174-6709a44eb36a'
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET miner_address = 'exampleminer' WHERE block_number = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET receiver_address = 'newreceiver@example.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE block_details SET miner_address = 'new_miner_address' WHERE block_id = 10;
UPDATE transaction_details SET success = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE block_details SET transaction_count = transaction_count + 1, block_date = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE block_id = 201;
UPDATE transaction_details SET success = true WHERE gas_fee < 10.00;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE block_information SET miner_address = '0xABC123' WHERE block_number = 500;
UPDATE transaction_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Approved' WHERE analysis_id = 10;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE block_number > 100
UPDATE block_information SET miner_address = 'New Miner' WHERE block_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
UPDATE transaction_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Invalid Transaction' WHERE analysis_id IN (1, 2, 3)
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE addresses SET balance = 2000.50 WHERE address_id = 5;
UPDATE transactions SET block_number = 10 WHERE transaction_id = 20;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount + 100 WHERE block_number = 100;
UPDATE addresses SET balance = balance - 50 WHERE address_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 500;
